html.body:
This small technical test is so you can show off your automation skills. The task is to create automated tests using a language and framework of your choice.

Complete the following tasks:

  • Create as many automated tests as you see fit. Make sure you show good coding practices as this will be assessed
  • Push the tests to a git repository and provide us with the link
  • If any assumptions were made while choosing what to test provide that in an email

No data entered or submitted will be recorded or saved anywhere it is just an example application
